EmailTemplate.subject: 30% Faster Performance on 30% Less Infrastructure
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early04]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, 46% of VDI projects stall due to cost and performance issues. This fact emphasizes the need for a control system that delivers a desktop experience to end-users. This paper explores some of the common challenges facing VDI planning, deployment and operations Turbonomic assures an optimal end-user experience with VDI deployments. The software ensures that VDI deployments get the resources they need, when they need them, minimizing performance degradation in user instances across virtual and cloud environments. Are you ready to see all that Turbonomic has to offer you? Give the free trial a shot <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early04]]> and see just how Turbonomic will drive your environment to perpetual health. <[[http://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early04]]> - The Turbonomic Team
